p: EOs have been isolated, as previously reported, by direct steam distillation using a 62 L steel distillator apparatus (Albrigi Luigi E0131, Verona, Italy) [ 19, 20, 22]. Briefly, plant materials (about 1.5 kg) were subjected to fractioned steam distillation [ 20], collecting EOs at six interval times of 1, 2, 3, 6, 12, and 24 h, in case of RS a seventh fraction was collected after 30 h.
